attributes.review: I literally just wanted to download this app to stay updated on the campaign and to support our Cheeto of a president. It is extremely hard to navigate through, however, and the application took over 3 days to download. It also took all my storage and started downloading images of trump that I did NOT need to see.
attributes.title: This app is ✨garbage✨

attributes.review: This app took so long to download! Unbelievable! I have a new phone too! AND after downloading everything was slow and loaded ALL THE TIME!!!!! I am a very busy woman and do NOT have time to wait! THIS IS COMPLETELY UNACCEPTABLE AND NEEDS TO BE FIXED!!!!!!!!! Better yet, take down the app! 🤬👿🙀 It also gave me a virus!!!!!!!! A VIRUS!!??!??! I HATE THIS APP MORE THAN HUMANLY POSSIBLE!!!!! TAKE IT DOWN NOW!!! 🤬🙀😳🤬👿🙀 I AM UTTERLY SHOCKED AT HOW DISGUSTING THIS APP IS?!!!?????!!!!!!!!
attributes.userName: Wow thia app is really hoodd
attributes.title: Awful App!!! TAKE IT DOWN NOW AND DONT MAKE ANOTHER!!!!

attributes.review: The first thing I saw when I opened this app was “Trump” and I was immediately uncomfortable. There are many inaccurate information being displayed. AND MY PHONE KEPT FREEZING EVERYTIME I OPENED IT! If I could rate this 0/5 stars, I would! And then it kept asking me if about someone named MAGA and I don’t know anyone named that. I can not believe i was introduced to such an app.
attributes.title: Please Read For Improvements

This app is trash and I think it should completely be deleted off the App Store!!😭🤢

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrendous, this first thing it asks you for is your phone number like what, why, so i can get pop ups on my phone to distract me from the bad stuff that’s going on in the world, what does this app do to help me be a better citizen of the USA, absolutely nothing, i vote and that is it, so yes i do hate this app, it’s absolutely useless .
attributes.title: the worst app on the app store
